mdRecord.dcterms:title: Alcaroid can
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: American Ferment Co. (Buffalo, N.Y.) [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Label reads: "Alcaroid, a highly efficient antacid containing the vegetable digestive ferment - caroid; The American Ferment Co. Buffalo, N.Y., U.S.A." Directions for use listed on the container. Lid is shows significant rust.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine bottles
